Title: Councillors at toronto city hall: retract the unconstitutional hiking of our home tax and raising of transit fairs while illegally stripping our elected mayors power
Overview:
they have breached the holy bible of city hall "the constitution of canada.

if we allow them to continue we will be in trouble we will see the "gravy train come back and the good sheople of toronto will pay for it. they think we are sheep and believe everything they propagate!! the mayor never stole a dime never took a bribe never squandered a penny

after a serious investigation into his business professional and lets not forget personal what was the outcome? "he got stoned? dear God call the department of Homeland security!!
Letter Body: retract the unconstitutional hiking of our home tax and raising of transit fairs while illegally stripping our elected mayors power
